data.description: Interface to a Javascript tooltip library
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
HTML::Tooltip::Javascript provides a perl interface for easy use of
    Walter Zorn's Javascript tooltip library. See:

    http://www.walterzorn.com/tooltip/tooltip_e.htm

    It's intended for use in applications running in a web environment
    (e.g. in a cgi script running in a web browser), where Javascript is
    enabled. The output it produces is mostly javascript but has some
    small amount of HTML.

    Discussions on the module-authors mailing list and
    comp.lang.perl.modules gave rise in many suggestions. HTML::Tooltip
    was the most common suggestion. We decided on
    HTML::Tooltip::Javascript so as not to restrict other people from
    creating other HTML::Tooltip modules (e.g. a module to produce css
    tooltips).
